alert.note: Alert for Central Plaquemines; Lower Jefferson; Upper Jefferson; Upper Plaquemines; Upper St. Bernard; Western Orleans (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 3:27PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central St. Bernard, southwestern Orleans, north central Jefferson and northwestern Plaquemines Parishes through 400 PM CDT... At 327 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Terrytown, or near Timberlane. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... New Orleans, Chalmette, Marrero, Harvey, Timberlane, Belle Chasse, Avondale, Metairie, Jefferson, Gretna, Westwego, Woodmere, Violet, Terrytown, Meraux, Bridge City, Poydras, Estelle, Arabi and Elmwood. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 229 and 241. Interstate 610 between mile markers 1 and 4. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Central Plaquemines; Lower Jefferson; Upper Jefferson; Upper Plaquemines; Upper St. Bernard; Western Orleans
